Healeying Flanders

2019-06-09

#Illustration

Healeying Flanders is an organization that organizes a tour for vintage cars every year.

> team

Eva Denys

> tools

Illustrator

> the brief

To give even more the feeling of a classic car rally race, they asked me to design a rally plate.

> the solution

First I did some research of how a classic rally plate looks like, etc. Then I illustrated some plates and illustrated an illustration of the car that the client gave me as reference.   Now every year, not 2020 due to Covid 19, the client comes back to ask the same design but in another color. And every year they bring me a rally plate.
